title: Sony TDG-BT500A / TDG-BT400A Active 3d Glasses for 2013 or Later Sony Tv
description: This glasses model is TDG-BT400A with TDG-BT500A package box , exactly the same as TDG-BT500A . because TDG-BT400A come with TV together , and TDG-BT500A is for resale , in order to distinguish them from different sales channel , Sony name them with 2 model number for their convenience , but they are exactly the same . this only works for : US:KDL-46W900A / KDL-55W900A / KDL-65W850A / XBR-55X850A / XBR-65X850A AU:KDL-46W900A / KDL-55W900A / KDL-65W850A / KD-55X8504A / KD-65X8504A UK:KDL-40W905A / KDL-46W905A / KDL-55W905A / KDL-65W855A DE:KDL-40W905A / KDL-46W905A / KDL-55W905A / KDL-65W855A this doesn't work for 2010~2012 Sony TV !
